title: Nieobecni
overview: After a long absence, Mila Gajda, a valued and well-known performer, and dancer come to her hometown of Kaspr√≥w, to celebrate Christmas with her family. When Mila arrives home, she finds crumbs on the plates, cold tea in cups, a carp swimming in the bathtub, and preparations for Christmas. However, the most important thing is missing - her parents and a brother.
